'''Colour the World''' was a [[MC Championship]] {{w|Twitch Rivals}} event, organised in collaboration with [[Twitch]] and involving [[Mojang Studios]], the fifty-fifth of its history, hosted as a part of {{Wikipedia|TwitchCon}} EU in Rotterdam, Netherlands.

At the event, Mojang Studios revealed the name of the [[Chase the Skies]] game drop, coinciding with the release of a ''[[Minecraft Monthly]]'' episode that likewise revealed the drop's name. They also showcased its features and presented a trailer.<ref>{{tweet|Minecraft|1928514637227565567|Colour The World on @TwitchRivals. Tune into a twist on @MCChampionship_ during @TwitchCon where creators will face off in wild mini games to reclaim their team colors. In addition, we'll also be announcing some exciting news in regard to our upcoming game drop, Make sure to tune in: https://msft.it/6014ScbbQ|May 30, 2025}}</ref><ref>{{twl|2474235789|MC Championship: Colour the World on Twitch Rivals <nowiki>|</nowiki> LIVE From TwitchCon Europe|t=03h04m00s|TwitchRivals|June 1, 2025}}</ref>
